entry.title: Next meetup, 7.30pm Wed 5th October at The Art House, Southampton
entry.content:
The next meetup is at The Art House, Southapton on Wed 5th October at 7.30pm

Let us know if you are coming on facebook http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=139793102784775 and bring a friend.

entry.title: Next Meeting and Arduino Evening
entry.content:
We'll be heading over to the Arthouse on the17th of August at 7:30pm:

View Larger Map

There'll be more discussion on forming a company, setting up our space, funding options etc. Along with general discussion about hacking, making and coding... and coffee. It's free, but donations to the Arthouse are always appreciated.

Our members will also be bringing along their various Arduino projects to show off and explain ( info on Arduinos can be found here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arduino ) and there'll be opportunities to get your hands dirty actually trying out the boards. So if you're interested, even if you've never touched electronics or coding before, then come along.

There's a Facebook event at: http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=196232490438100
